steps.text: The pilot of RYR4735, a Boeing 737-800 at Stand 4, requests taxi clearance to runway 31.
Ground control instructs RYR4735 to taxi to holding point C1 via taxiways Alpha and Charlie, and advises to contact Tower on 118.3 when reaching C1.
Upon reaching C1, the pilot switches to Malta Tower frequency and reports holding short runway 31, ready for departure.
Tower acknowledges RYR4735, and provides takeoff clearance.
The pilot reads back the takeoff clearance, lines up, and commences the takeoff roll on runway 31.
After becoming airborne, the pilot reports to Tower: RYR4735 is airborne, passing 1000 feet.
Tower acknowledges the airborne report and instructs RYR4735 to contact Malta Radar on 128.15.
The pilot switches to Malta Radar and reports climbing through 1500 feet.
